item.description:
Another Social Networking in Framingham and will be on the 2nd Monday of the Month! (75+ Attended 1/14 Event)
Come Meet and Network with Other Professionals at New Venue in Framingham! There might be over 100 for This Event!
Bring business cards, a smile, and a professional attitude because it's time to make some valuable new business contacts in 2013.
Dress code is business casual

(Appetizers, Plenty of Free Parking, and Free RaffleÂ for Event Tickets plus More Giveaways to Win at Our Event)

[Over 100 Beers and 36 Drafts]


Advance Tickets Start at $5 and $10 Cash at the door if Available!
item.name: 2nd Monday Framingham (60+ Expected)
